alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 11:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette, Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 1215 AM EDT... At 1127 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort White to 16 miles southwest of Horseshoe Point. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Steinhatchee, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Tennille, Shamrock, Clara, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Guaranto Springs, Jena, Hines, Jonesboro, Grady, Hatch Bend, Eugene, Fletcher and Yellow Jacket. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
